mods.li: Medieval Madness: Tools of the Trade
Medieval Madness: Tools of the Trade

value.description: Craft mounted bows to protect your colony.
Allows for the creation of bows that can shoot fire arrows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fire arrows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of bows that can shoot fire arrows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft simple crossbows, that have superior armor penetration, but lower reload speed compared to shortbows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Multishot crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: A relatively simple upgrade to crossbow firing mechanism allows production of models that can fire several shots in a row before reloading.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft long range siege crossbows - sophisticated mechanisms capable of launching heavy projectiles over extreme ranges and piercing through all but heaviest of armors.
